phases.name: MISSION BRIEFING
phases.description: The Lead Architect delivers a visceral invocation—igniting fevered anticipation and collective conviction for a world-altering cultural odyssey.
action_steps: Instructor unveils the sacred mission and high-stakes objectives
Teams are formed with clear roles and purpose
Expectations are set for discovery and legacy creation
phases.psychological_goal: Establish profound purpose and urgent curiosity

phases.name: SECURE THE VAULT
phases.description: Each syndicate receives 3-5 international currencies with encrypted Clue Cards—espionage meets archaeology, igniting primal engagement.
action_steps: Teams claim their exclusive currency artifacts
Clue cards are distributed with cryptic details
Initial observations and hypotheses are formed
phases.psychological_goal: Trigger ownership, exclusivity, and investigative drive

phases.name: THE DECODE
phases.description: Through relentless analysis, teams deconstruct hidden codes, connect mythos to nation, and unravel epoch-spanning symbolism.
action_steps: Use clue cards and visual analysis for symbol identification
Conduct digital research to verify origins and meanings
Document findings with precision and creativity
phases.psychological_goal: Achieve flow state through challenge and mastery

phases.name: LEGACY FORGING
phases.description: Groups synthesize revelations, forging a legacy presentation radiating status, pride, and historic contribution—serotonin at molecular scale.
action_steps: Create visual or verbal presentation format
Prepare to share cultural insights with conviction
phases.psychological_goal: Amplify sense of mastery, contribution, and significance

phases.name: THE GRAND CONVENE
phases.description: A convocation of minds: engage, debate, and inscribe new meaning to currency as the ultimate tool of silent cultural transmission.
action_steps: Each team presents their findings with passion
Class discusses currency as cultural communication
Collective insights are synthesized and celebrated
phases.psychological_goal: Foster belonging, recognition, and shared wisdom

materials.detail: Genuine or ultra-high-fidelity images of global currencies
Mind-capturing devices: pen, paper, or digital notepad

learning_objectives: Ignite curiosity about world cultures using tangible artifacts
Foster critical thinking through symbol decoding and research
Strengthen collaboration and communication through team dynamics
Develop appreciation for global diversity and cultural expression
neuroscience_foundation: Dopamine release through discovery, anticipation, and completion
Serotonin elevation via status, pride, and achievement recognition
Oxytocin bonding through teamwork and shared accomplishment
Flow state activation via optimal challenge-skill balance

design_principles.unbridled_passion: Immediate, consuming affinity for cultural exploration
design_principles.profound_exaltation: Feeling of superiority through knowledge acquisition
design_principles.limitless_inspiration: Catalyst for personal and intellectual revolution
